---
title: rint~

description: round to nearest integer

categories:
 - object

pdcategory: ELSE, Signal Math

arguments:

inlets: 
  1st:
  - type: signal
    description: input signal

outlets:
  1st:
  - type: signal
    description: rounded integer signal

draft: false
---

[rint~] takes a float input and rounds it to the nearest integer value.
